locations.name: Abandoned Mega Mart
locations.description: A once-bustling retail giant now stands as a hollow shell of consumerism, its automatic doors permanently jammed open. The flickering emergency lights cast eerie shadows across overturned shopping carts and scattered debris. The faint smell of rotting produce mixes with something more sinister deeper in the store.
features: Collapsed shelving creating hazardous pathways
Bloody handprints leading to the stockroom
Shattered glass everywhere from looted electronics section
secrets: Rumored manager's office safe still intact behind barricaded door

special_types: Stockroom Stalkers (zombies that hide in shelves and ambush survivors)

buildings.name: Abandoned Mega Mart Warehouse
buildings.description: A sprawling, intact warehouse that once served as the storage hub for a massive retail chain. The interior is a maze of towering shelves, stacked with remnants of pre-apocalypse goods. Flickering emergency lights cast long shadows, and the air smells of dust and decay. The building is eerily quiet, save for the occasional creak of metal or distant shuffling.

rooms.name: Main Storage Area
rooms.description: A vast open space filled with rows of metal shelves, some toppled over. Crates and boxes are scattered haphazardly.

rooms.name: Loading Dock
rooms.description: A large area with roll-up doors, where trucks once unloaded merchandise. A few abandoned forklifts sit idle.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: A small, cluttered room with a desk and filing cabinets. Papers are strewn everywhere.

rooms.name: Break Room
rooms.description: A dingy room with a few tables and chairs. A broken vending machine stands in the corner.

special_features: High ceilings with catwalks
Emergency lighting still functional
Heavy machinery that could be repurposed

locations.name: Sunset Ridge Subdivision
locations.description: A quiet suburban neighborhood frozen in time, with overgrown lawns and abandoned bicycles still lying in driveways. Most houses remain intact though some show signs of forced entry and struggle. The occasional wind chime creates an eerie soundtrack to the apocalypse.
features: well-maintained community garden
partially boarded-up houses
functional rainwater collection system
secrets: One basement contains a survivor's detailed apocalypse journal

buildings.name: Sunset Ridge Apartments
buildings.description: A well-preserved apartment complex in the Sunset Ridge Subdivision, this building has remained largely untouched by the chaos outside. The exterior is clean, and the interior shows signs of recent habitation before being abandoned. Faded posters and scattered personal items hint at the lives once lived here. The building offers a relatively safe haven with multiple entry points and clear lines of sight.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: The main entrance area with a front desk and seating area.

rooms.name: Mail Room
rooms.description: A small room with mailboxes and package storage.

rooms.name: Apartment Units
rooms.description: Standard living spaces with bedrooms, kitchens, and bathrooms.

rooms.name: Stairwell
rooms.description: Central staircase connecting all floors.

dangers: Potential zombie horde in dark corners
special_features: Functional elevators (power-dependent)
Rooftop access with good vantage points
Some units have working gas stoves

buildings.name: Sunset Ridge Apartments
buildings.description: A fortified apartment building in the Sunset Ridge Subdivision, its exterior reinforced with metal barricades and boarded-up windows. The interior shows signs of previous habitation, with makeshift defenses and scavenged supplies. The upper floors provide a vantage point for spotting threats, while the ground floor remains heavily secured.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: The main entrance area, barricaded with furniture and sandbags.

rooms.name: Apartment 1
rooms.description: A ransacked living space, likely used as a storage area by survivors.

rooms.name: Apartment 2
rooms.description: A fortified sleeping area with mattresses on the floor.

rooms.name: Apartment 3
rooms.description: A lookout post with a clear view of the surrounding streets.

rooms.name: Apartment 4
rooms.description: A makeshift medical area with limited supplies.

rooms.name: Apartment 5
rooms.description: A scavenged kitchen with a broken stove.

rooms.name: Apartment 6
rooms.description: A collapsed room with a hole in the ceiling.

special_features: Rooftop access for scouting
Barricaded windows with firing slits
Graffiti warnings on walls

locations.name: Rustbelt Tool & Die
locations.description: A small manufacturing plant that once produced precision machine parts, now silent except for the occasional creak of metal settling. The skeletal remains of industrial equipment loom in the dim light filtering through broken skylights. A thin layer of metal dust coats every surface, muffling footsteps.
features: overhead crane system
partially disassembled machinery
employee break room with intact vending machine
secrets: hidden safe in manager's office containing emergency cash

special_types: rusted zombies (covered in metal shards)

buildings.name: Rustbelt Tool & Die
buildings.description: A once-thriving industrial factory now stands as a fortified bastion against the undead. The reinforced steel doors and boarded-up windows suggest survivors have been here recently. The interior is a maze of machinery and makeshift barricades, with the faint smell of oil and decay lingering in the air. The upper floors provide a vantage point for scouting the surrounding area.
buildings.layout:
Ground Floor:
+----------------+
| Office | Break |
+--------+-------+
| Main  | Storage|
| Floor | Room  |
+--------+-------+
| Workshop | Exit |
+----------------+

Upper Floors:
+----------------+
| Catwalk | Sniper|
|--------+ Nest  |
| Storage| Lookout|
+----------------+

rooms.name: Main Floor
rooms.description: The heart of the factory, filled with heavy machinery and workbenches.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: A small administrative area with a view of the main floor.

rooms.name: Break Room
rooms.description: A place where workers once took their breaks, now repurposed for survival.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: Cluttered with spare parts and supplies, some still usable.

rooms.name: Workshop
rooms.description: A well-equipped area for repairing and crafting items.

rooms.name: Catwalk
rooms.description: A metal walkway overlooking the main floor, providing a strategic advantage.

rooms.name: Sniper Nest
rooms.description: A fortified position with a clear view of the surroundings.

special_features: Fortified entry points
Overhead catwalks for scouting
Workshop for crafting repairs
Sniper nest with vantage points

locations.name: St. Marrow's Memorial Hospital
locations.description: A once-renowned medical facility now stands as a grim monument to the outbreak. The hallways are littered with overturned gurneys and shattered medical equipment, while the flickering fluorescent lights reveal disturbing stains on the walls. The pharmacy remains partially intact, though getting to it requires navigating through treacherous corridors.
features: collapsed emergency room entrance
active backup generator
quarantine zone with broken containment
secrets: hidden research lab in basement

special_types: infected medical staff in hazmat suits

locations.name: St. Marrow's Memorial Hospital
locations.description: A once-renowned medical facility now stands as a grim monument to the outbreak. The hallways are littered with overturned gurneys and shattered medical equipment, while the flickering fluorescent lights reveal disturbing stains on the walls. The pharmacy remains partially intact, though getting to it requires navigating through treacherous corridors.
features: collapsed emergency room entrance
active backup generator
quarantine zone with broken containment
secrets: hidden research lab in basement

special_types: infected medical staff in hazmat suits

locations.name: Midnight Mall
locations.description: A sprawling shopping complex frozen in time, its once-bright storefronts now dark and lifeless. The shattered glass ceilings let in eerie shafts of moonlight that illuminate the occasional abandoned kiosk or overturned fountain. The upper levels have partially collapsed, creating dangerous chokepoints and hidden pathways.
features: collapsed upper walkways creating vertical navigation challenges
emergency generator still holding some charge
security office with intact surveillance monitors
secrets: A hidden panic room behind the manager's office containing valuable supplies

special_types: Crawlers (zombies missing lower limbs)
Screamers (zombies that alert others when agitated)

buildings.name: Midnight Mall Office Annex
buildings.description: A partially collapsed office building attached to the Midnight Mall, its upper floors are unstable and littered with debris. The basement remains intact but is pitch-black and likely infested. Flickering emergency lights cast eerie shadows through broken cubicles and overturned furniture.
buildings.layout:
Ground Floor:
+-------+-------+
| RECEPT | HALL |
+---+---+-------+
| OFF | STAIRS |
+---+---+-------+

Upper Floors:
+---+---+---+
| O | O | O |
+---+---+---+
| O | S | O |
+---+---+---+
(Broken walls, partial collapse)

rooms.name: Reception Area
rooms.description: Shattered glass doors, toppled security turnstiles, and bloodstained visitor logs. A zombie in a security uniform shambles behind the desk.

rooms.name: Open Office Floor
rooms.description: Cubicles knocked over like dominos, papers everywhere. A fire axe is embedded in a support beam where someone tried to barricade a door.

rooms.name: Basement Storage
rooms.description: Pitch black except for faint light from broken pipes. The sound of dripping water masks shuffling footsteps in the dark.

special_features: Direct underground access to mall via basement
Emergency stairwell doors welded shut from outside
Faint radio signals detectable near rooftop

buildings.name: Midnight Mall Office Annex
buildings.description: A surprisingly intact office building connected to the Midnight Mall, likely used for administrative purposes before the outbreak. The interior shows signs of a rushed evacuation with overturned furniture and scattered documents. Fluorescent lights flicker intermittently, casting eerie shadows through the glass-walled offices. A faint smell of stale coffee and mildew lingers in the air.

rooms.name: Reception Area
rooms.description: The welcoming area with a curved desk and visitor chairs now covered in dust. Security turnstiles stand frozen mid-rotation.

rooms.name: Main Hallway
rooms.description: Central corridor connecting all areas, lined with motivational posters now peeling off the walls.

rooms.name: Manager's Office
rooms.description: Corner office with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the parking lot. A leather chair lies on its side.

rooms.name: Conference Room
rooms.description: Large meeting space with a massive oval table. Projector screen shows the last PowerPoint presentation forever frozen mid-slide.

rooms.name: Cubicle Farm
rooms.description: Open office space with dozens of identical workstations in various states of disarray.

rooms.name: Break Room
rooms.description: Small kitchenette area with appliances and plastic tables. The refrigerator door hangs open ominously.

dangers: Zombie office workers trapped in closed offices
Trip hazards from scattered files and chairs
special_features: Emergency stairwell provides safe vertical movement
Glass walls allow visibility but may shatter unexpectedly
Working intercom system that could be repurposed
Roof access from top floor for potential escape

buildings.name: Midnight Mall Office Annex
buildings.description: A surprisingly intact office building connected to the Midnight Mall, this annex served as administrative headquarters before the outbreak. The fluorescent lights still flicker intermittently, powered by an aging backup generator. Papers and office supplies are scattered across desks, suggesting a hurried evacuation. The air smells of stale coffee and dust.

rooms.name: Reception Area
rooms.description: The welcoming space with a curved desk and waiting chairs, now covered in dust.

rooms.name: Main Hallway
rooms.description: Central corridor connecting all ground floor rooms, with emergency lighting.

rooms.name: Manager's Office
rooms.description: Private office with large windows overlooking the mall parking lot.

rooms.name: Conference Room
rooms.description: Second floor meeting space with a long table and presentation equipment.

rooms.name: Cubicle Farm
rooms.description: Open office space with 12 identical workstations in various states of disarray.

rooms.name: Executive Suite
rooms.description: Lavish top-floor office with private bathroom and seating area.

rooms.name: File Room
rooms.description: Organized storage for documents with heavy fireproof cabinets.

special_features: still-functioning backup power
direct roof access from executive suite
intercom system that still works intermittently

locations.name: Rustvale Urgent Care
locations.description: A small medical outpost that was quickly overrun during the early days of the outbreak. The waiting room is a graveyard of broken chairs and scattered patient files, while the treatment rooms hold the remnants of desperate last stands. The back storage area might still have some usable supplies, but the collapsed ceiling in the west wing makes navigation hazardous.
features: partially collapsed west wing
emergency generator room
blood-stained triage area
secrets: hidden safe behind a framed medical license

special_types: former medical staff (faster movement in dark areas)

buildings.name: Rustvale Urgent Care
buildings.description: A small but well-stocked pharmacy attached to a defunct urgent care clinic. The building is surprisingly intact, with most of its supplies still on the shelves. Flickering emergency lights cast long shadows across the linoleum floors, and the faint smell of antiseptic lingers in the air. The back rooms contain medical equipment that could be invaluable to survivors.

rooms.name: Waiting Room
rooms.description: A cramped waiting area with plastic chairs and outdated magazines. The reception desk is littered with abandoned paperwork.

rooms.name: Pharmacy
rooms.description: The main drug dispensing area with a tall counter and shelves of medications behind protective glass.

rooms.name: Exam Room 1
rooms.description: A standard examination room with an exam table and basic medical equipment.

rooms.name: Exam Room 2
rooms.description: Slightly larger than Exam Room 1, with additional equipment for minor procedures.

rooms.name: Supply Closet
rooms.description: A cramped storage room packed with medical supplies and spare equipment.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: The doctor's private office with a desk and patient records.

special_features: Pharmacy has a secure metal gate that can be locked from inside
One exam room has an intact blood pressure monitor that still works
Office contains patient records that may reveal useful information

locations.name: Ironclad Foundry
locations.description: A massive industrial complex that once produced heavy machinery, now silent except for the occasional groan of rusted metal. The cavernous workshops are littered with half-assembled equipment and scattered tools, while the catwalks above creak ominously under unseen weight. The furnaces have long gone cold, but the remnants of their last fires still linger in the air.
features: overhead crane system
partially collapsed furnace room
network of maintenance tunnels
secrets: hidden underground bunker beneath the main office

special_types: armored (rusted metal fragments embedded in flesh)

locations.name: Whispering Gorge
locations.description: A deep, narrow canyon carved by ancient rivers, now eerily silent except for the faint whispers of wind through its crevices. The steep walls provide natural shelter, but the winding paths can easily disorient the unwary. Scattered boulders and dry riverbeds hint at long-lost water sources.
features: narrow, winding paths
natural rock shelters
echoing wind tunnels
secrets: A hidden cave system behind a waterfall (currently dry)

special_types: Climbers (zombies adapted to scale rocky surfaces)

locations.name: Whispering Gorge
locations.description: A deep, narrow canyon carved by ancient rivers, now eerily silent except for the faint whispers of wind through its crevices. The steep walls provide natural shelter, but the winding paths can easily disorient the unwary. Scattered boulders and dry riverbeds hint at long-lost water sources.
features: narrow, winding paths
natural rock shelters
echoing wind tunnels
secrets: A hidden cave system behind a waterfall (currently dry)

special_types: Climbers (zombies adapted to scale rocky surfaces)

locations.name: Willowfen Marsh
locations.description: A sprawling wetland of shallow pools and dense reeds, where the air hums with the sound of insects and the occasional croak of frogs. The water is surprisingly clear, fed by underground springs, and the soft ground muffles footsteps. Ancient willow trees stand sentinel along the edges, their drooping branches creating natural shelters.
features: natural spring-fed pools
dense willow groves
raised peat mounds
secrets: A hidden dry island in the center of the marsh with an abandoned trapper's cabin

buildings.name: Willowfen Watchtower
buildings.description: A fortified observation facility built on stilts above Willowfen Marsh. Originally used by park rangers, it has been heavily reinforced with scrap metal and wooden barricades. The elevated position provides clear sightlines across the boggy terrain, making it a strategic outpost. Faded maps and weather equipment suggest it was once a monitoring station.

rooms.name: Entry Hold
rooms.description: Sandbag-reinforced foyer with murder holes covering the entrance

rooms.name: Bunk Room
rooms.description: Converted sleeping area with hammocks strung between support beams

rooms.name: Watch Post
rooms.description: 360-degree observation deck with mounted spotting scope

special_features: Retractable ladder system
Marsh gas warning bells
Sun-bleached skulls marking sniper ranges

locations.name: Willowfen Marsh
locations.description: A sprawling wetland of shallow pools and dense reeds, where the air hums with the sound of insects and the occasional croak of frogs. The water is surprisingly clear, fed by underground springs, and the soft ground muffles footsteps. Ancient willow trees stand sentinel along the edges, their drooping branches creating natural shelters.
features: natural spring-fed pools
dense willow groves
raised peat mounds
secrets: A hidden dry island in the center of the marsh with an abandoned trapper's cabin

locations.name: Blackfang Chasm
locations.description: A jagged fissure in the earth, its depths shrouded in perpetual darkness. The walls are slick with an unknown, tar-like substance that emits a faint, sickly glow. The air is thick with the scent of decay and the distant echoes of something moving in the shadows.
features: Tar-like substance on walls that emits a faint glow
Echoes of unseen creatures in the depths
Narrow, unstable ledges that crumble underfoot
secrets: A hidden cave system beneath the chasm, rumored to hold ancient relics

special_types: Glowfang Zombies (infected with the tar-like substance, emitting a faint glow)
Echo Stalkers (zombies that mimic sounds to lure prey)

locations.name: Blackfang Chasm
locations.description: A jagged fissure in the earth, its depths shrouded in perpetual darkness. The walls are slick with an unknown, tar-like substance that emits a faint, sickly glow. The air is thick with the scent of decay and the distant echoes of something moving in the shadows.
features: Tar-like substance on walls that emits a faint glow
Echoes of unseen creatures in the depths
Narrow, unstable ledges that crumble underfoot
secrets: A hidden cave system beneath the chasm, rumored to hold ancient relics

special_types: Glowfang Zombies (infected with the tar-like substance, emitting a faint glow)
Echo Stalkers (zombies that mimic sounds to lure prey)

locations.name: Echo Ridge Estates
locations.description: A once-upscale suburban neighborhood now overrun by the infected, where the skeletal remains of McMansions loom like tombstones. The streets are choked with overturned vehicles and the air carries the faint scent of rotting wood and rust. Fungal growths pulse ominously from broken windows, suggesting something more sinister than zombies lurks here.
features: collapsed rooftops creating deadly traps
overgrown gardens hiding movement
basement shelters with barricaded doors
secrets: A hidden panic room in one house contains a survivor's research notes on the fungal infection

special_types: Fungal Spore Carriers (explode in clouds of toxic spores when killed)

locations.name: Echo Ridge Estates
locations.description: A once-upscale suburban neighborhood now overrun by the infected, where the skeletal remains of McMansions loom like tombstones. The streets are choked with overturned vehicles and the air carries the faint scent of rotting wood and rust. Fungal growths pulse ominously from broken windows, suggesting something more sinister than zombies lurks here.
features: collapsed rooftops creating deadly traps
overgrown gardens hiding movement
basement shelters with barricaded doors
secrets: A hidden panic room in one house contains a survivor's research notes on the fungal infection

special_types: Fungal Spore Carriers (explode in clouds of toxic spores when killed)

locations.name: St. Marrow's Clinic
locations.description: A small, abandoned medical clinic with shattered windows and bloodstained walls. The flickering emergency lights cast eerie shadows over the ransacked shelves, while the faint hum of a backup generator suggests some systems might still be operational. The scent of antiseptic lingers beneath the stench of decay.
features: partially functional backup generator
broken pharmacy cabinet
bloodstained triage area
secrets: A hidden basement storage room with untouched medical supplies

special_types: infected medical staff (slightly faster than normal zombies)

locations.name: The Rustbelt Overpass
locations.description: A crumbling highway overpass that once connected the city's industrial districts, now a skeletal ruin of twisted rebar and fractured concrete. The underpass has become a makeshift shelter for desperate survivors, evidenced by scattered campfires and barricaded alcoves. The constant groaning of metal under stress suggests it could collapse at any moment.
features: precariously dangling highway segments
makeshift survivor barricades
partially collapsed maintenance tunnels
secrets: a hidden survivor cache beneath a collapsed truck

special_types: climbers (zombies that scale vertical surfaces)

locations.name: Willowbrook Trailer Park
locations.description: A quiet, overgrown trailer park where nature has reclaimed the cracked asphalt roads. The rusted husks of mobile homes sit in eerie silence, their doors swaying gently in the wind. The air smells of damp earth and mildew, with no signs of recent human activity.
features: Overgrown vegetation creeping through broken windows
A lone, rusted swing set creaking in the breeze

locations.name: Willowbrook Trailer Park
locations.description: A quiet, overgrown trailer park where nature has reclaimed the cracked asphalt roads. The rusted husks of mobile homes sit in eerie silence, their doors swaying gently in the wind. The air smells of damp earth and mildew, with no signs of recent human activity.
features: Overgrown vegetation creeping through broken windows
A lone, rusted swing set creaking in the breeze

locations.name: Sunnyvale Mini-Mall
locations.description: A small, half-collapsed shopping center with most storefronts looted long ago. The remaining structures creak ominously in the wind, but the pharmacy and hardware store still hold some untouched supplies behind their security gates. Faded sale signs flutter like ghosts from the broken windows.
features: intact pharmacy with security gate
collapsed food court with edible mushrooms growing
working emergency exit lights powered by solar
secrets: hidden underground storage room accessible through pharmacy back office

special_types: shamblers (slow, decayed zombies trapped under debris)

locations.name: Sunnyvale Mini-Mall
locations.description: A small, half-collapsed shopping center with most storefronts looted long ago. The remaining structures creak ominously in the wind, but the pharmacy and hardware store still hold some untouched supplies behind their security gates. Faded sale signs flutter like ghosts from the broken windows.
features: intact pharmacy with security gate
collapsed food court with edible mushrooms growing
working emergency exit lights powered by solar
secrets: hidden underground storage room accessible through pharmacy back office

special_types: shamblers (slow, decayed zombies trapped under debris)

locations.name: The Overrun Mega-Mart
locations.description: A sprawling superstore that became a death trap when the outbreak hit, its cavernous aisles now filled with the shambling remnants of frenzied shoppers. Collapsed shelves and rotting merchandise create a maze of hazards, while the flickering emergency lights cast long shadows of lurking figures. The stench of decay is overwhelming, mixed with the acrid smell of spilled chemicals from the ruined cleaning aisle.
features: Collapsed ceiling sections creating deadly chokepoints
Motion-activated holiday displays still cycling through broken animations
A flooded electronics department with live wires sparking in standing water
secrets: A sealed manager's office with emergency supplies, accessible only via the collapsing roof

special_types: Screamer zombies (trigger hordes with loud wails)
Berserker zombies (enhanced strength from gym equipment impalements)

locations.name: The Overrun Mega-Mart
locations.description: A sprawling superstore that became a death trap when the outbreak hit, its cavernous aisles now filled with the shambling remnants of frenzied shoppers. Collapsed shelves and rotting merchandise create a maze of hazards, while the flickering emergency lights cast long shadows of lurking figures. The stench of decay is overwhelming, mixed with the acrid smell of spilled chemicals from the ruined cleaning aisle.
features: Collapsed ceiling sections creating deadly chokepoints
Motion-activated holiday displays still cycling through broken animations
A flooded electronics department with live wires sparking in standing water
secrets: A sealed manager's office with emergency supplies, accessible only via the collapsing roof

special_types: Screamer zombies (trigger hordes with loud wails)
Berserker zombies (enhanced strength from gym equipment impalements)

buildings.name: The Overrun Mega-Mart
buildings.description: Once a bustling retail giant, this Mega-Mart has been fortified by survivors into a makeshift stronghold. The exterior is lined with barricades of shopping carts and debris, while the interior is a maze of repurposed shelves and storage areas. The upper floors provide vantage points for snipers, and the ground floor is a chaotic blend of scavenged goods and defensive structures. The scent of decay and gunpowder lingers in the air.

rooms.name: Entrance
rooms.description: The main entry point, heavily barricaded with shopping carts and metal sheets. A narrow path allows entry, flanked by makeshift guard posts.

rooms.name: Storage
rooms.description: A chaotic mess of repurposed shelves and crates, filled with scavenged goods and supplies.

rooms.name: Cashier Area
rooms.description: The former checkout lanes, now used as a central hub for distributing supplies and coordinating defenses.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: A small, locked room that serves as the leader's quarters and planning area.

rooms.name: Break Room
rooms.description: Converted into a communal living space with sleeping bags and a small cooking area.

rooms.name: Sniper's Nest
rooms.description: A vantage point on the upper floor with clear views of the surrounding area.

rooms.name: Armory
rooms.description: A heavily guarded room stocked with weapons and ammunition.

rooms.name: Barracks
rooms.description: Sleeping quarters for the resident survivors, lined with cots and personal belongings.

dangers: Zombie hordes occasionally breach the perimeter
Traps set by survivors can be triggered accidentally
special_features: Makeshift watchtowers on the roof
Hidden escape routes through the stockroom
A functioning radio in the office for communication

locations.name: The Flooded Power Station
locations.description: A once-critical power substation now partially submerged under stagnant water from burst pipes. The flooded lower levels hide submerged electrical hazards, while the upper catwalks sway dangerously in the storm winds. The smell of ozone and rotting insulation hangs thick in the air.
features: Partially submerged control rooms with sparking equipment
Unstable metal catwalks swaying 30 feet above the water
Massive transformers humming with residual charge
secrets: A maintenance tunnel leading to undiscovered underground facilities

special_types: Electrocuted zombies with shocking touch

locations.name: Abandoned University Library
locations.description: The once-prestigious university library now stands as a hollowed-out ruin, its grand reading rooms littered with overturned bookshelves and the remnants of frantic last stands. The upper floors have partially collapsed, creating precarious walkways over piles of academic debris. The scent of mildew and old paper mixes with something far more sinister lingering in the shadows.
features: Collapsed upper floors creating dangerous vertical navigation
Special collections vault with reinforced doors still intact
Emergency lighting system flickers erratically
secrets: A hidden professor's office contains unfinished research on the outbreak

special_types: Librarian (enhanced hearing)

locations.name: The Flooded Power Station
locations.description: A once-critical power substation now partially submerged under stagnant water from burst pipes. The flooded lower levels hide submerged electrical hazards, while the upper catwalks sway dangerously in the storm winds. The smell of ozone and rotting insulation hangs thick in the air.
features: Partially submerged control rooms with sparking equipment
Unstable metal catwalks swaying 30 feet above the water
Massive transformers humming with residual charge
secrets: A maintenance tunnel leading to undiscovered underground facilities

special_types: Electrocuted zombies with shocking touch

locations.name: The Overrun Condominiums
locations.description: A once-luxurious high-rise condominium now stands as a towering death trap, its halls filled with the moans of the infected. The lower floors are completely overrun, while the upper levels remain unstable due to structural damage from fires and explosions. The air reeks of decay and the faint, lingering scent of desperation from those who tried to shelter here.
features: Collapsed stairwells blocking access to upper floors
Elevator shafts now serve as vertical death pits
Balconies with precarious views of the ruined city below
secrets: A hidden panic room on the penthouse floor, untouched but inaccessible

special_types: Bloaters (infected swollen with toxic gas)
Crawlers (zombies with broken limbs that drag themselves)

locations.name: The Fungal Chasm
locations.description: A deep, gaping fissure in the earth, now overgrown with pulsating fungal growths that emit a sickly bioluminescent glow. The air is thick with spores that distort vision and induce hallucinations. The walls seem to breathe, covered in a living carpet of mycelium that reacts to movement.
resources: strangely untouched pre-apocalypse supplies in deeper pockets
features: spore clouds that impair vision and cognition
unstable terrain with hidden crevices
bioluminescent lighting that attracts both zombies and desperate survivors
secrets: a hidden underground stream that may lead to an untouched bunker

special_types: spore-infected zombies that release toxic clouds when agitated
fungal symbiote zombies with enhanced regeneration

locations.name: The Fungal Chasm

resources: strangely untouched pre-apocalypse supplies in deeper pockets

fungal symbiote zombies with enhanced regeneration

locations.name: The Necrotic Bio-Lab
locations.description: A former high-security medical research facility now overrun with grotesque, mutated specimens. The halls are lined with shattered containment units, their former inhabitants now roaming freely. The air is thick with the stench of rotting flesh and acrid chemicals, making every breath a struggle.
features: broken containment chambers leaking unknown fluids
flickering emergency lights casting eerie shadows
walls covered in pulsating organic growths
secrets: A hidden underground lab with a potential cure prototype

special_types: Mutated Lab Subjects
Biohazard Zombies
Necrotic Surgeons

locations.description: A former high-security medical research facility now overrun with grotesque, mutated specimens. Necrotic Surgeons

locations.name: The Hollow Mall
locations.description: A once-bustling shopping center now eerily silent, its glass ceilings shattered and letting in the relentless rain. The lower levels are flooded, creating shallow pools that reflect the dim light from broken store signs. Surprisingly, many stores remain intact, their shelves still stocked with forgotten goods.
features: flooded lower levels
intact storefronts
collapsed central atrium
secrets: A hidden survivor cache in the manager's office

special_types: drowned (waterlogged zombies in flooded areas)

locations.name: The Hollow Mall
locations.description: A once-bustling shopping center now eerily silent, its glass ceilings shattered and letting in the relentless rain. The lower levels are flooded, creating shallow pools that reflect the dim light from broken store signs. Surprisingly, many stores remain intact, their shelves still stocked with forgotten goods.
features: flooded lower levels
intact storefronts
collapsed central atrium
secrets: A hidden survivor cache in the manager's office

special_types: drowned (waterlogged zombies in flooded areas)

locations.name: The Rupture Foundry
locations.description: A massive industrial complex where molten metal once flowed like rivers, now frozen in grotesque formations. The air is thick with toxic fumes from ruptured chemical vats, and the ground trembles occasionally from unstable machinery. The entire facility hums with residual energy, creating an eerie glow in the perpetual twilight.
features: Molten metal sculptures formed during the catastrophe
Unstable chemical vats that periodically explode
A network of catwalks suspended over pools of toxic sludge
secrets: A hidden control room with access to the facility's self-destruct sequence

special_types: Corroded Walkers (zombies covered in acid burns and metal shards)
Furnace Ghouls (zombies that burst into flames when agitated)

locations.name: Willowridge Estates
locations.description: A quiet suburban neighborhood frozen in time, its manicured lawns now overgrown and its picket fences broken. Most houses stand eerily intact, their windows boarded up or shattered. The silence is punctuated only by the occasional creak of a swinging porch swing.
features: Overgrown gardens with wild herbs
Abandoned family photos in dusty frames
Shattered children's toys scattered on driveways

locations.name: Pineview Trailer Park
locations.description: A small, rundown trailer park where time seems to have stopped. The trailers are weathered and many have been looted, but some still contain remnants of past lives. The air is eerily still, broken only by the occasional creak of a loose door or the rustle of wind through broken windows.
features: abandoned trailers with personal belongings
a small playground overgrown with weeds
a communal fire pit filled with ashes
secrets: a hidden stash of sentimental items under one of the trailers

locations.name: Pineview Trailer Park
locations.description: A small, rundown trailer park where time seems to have stopped. The trailers are weathered and many have been looted, but some still contain remnants of past lives. features: abandoned trailers with personal belongings
a small playground overgrown with weeds
a communal fire pit filled with ashes
secrets: a hidden stash of sentimental items under one of the trailers

locations.name: Rustbolt Scrapyard
locations.description: A sprawling industrial scrapyard filled with rusting machinery, stacked metal husks, and forgotten industrial equipment. The skeletal remains of cranes loom overhead, their chains swaying gently in the wind. Despite its decay, there's still usable salvage among the wreckage.
features: towering piles of crushed cars
a partially collapsed crane
an old office trailer with intact blueprints
secrets: a hidden underground storage room beneath the office trailer

special_types: rust-infected (slow but armored with metal fragments)

locations.name: Overwatch Base Sigma
locations.description: A once-secret military outpost now overrun by the infected. The high-security perimeter is breached in multiple places, with bodies of both soldiers and zombies littering the compound. The air smells of gunpowder and decay, with distant growls echoing from the barracks.
features: Heavily fortified command center with blast doors still intact
Armory with visible weapon racks (all cleared out)
Radio tower emitting a faint distress signal on loop
secrets: Classified documents about early outbreak containment efforts in the commander's office safe

special_types: Military-grade infected (armored, tactical movement)
Radioactive screamers (distort comms)

locations.name: The Foundry
locations.description: An abandoned steel foundry with towering smokestacks and rusted conveyor belts. The furnaces have long gone cold, but scattered tools and raw materials remain among the ash-coated floors. The cavernous interior echoes with the occasional groan of shifting metal.
features: massive dormant furnace
overhead crane system
partially collapsed catwalks
secrets: hidden underground maintenance tunnels

special_types: ash-covered zombies that blend with the environment
